ink.base.connectors.RDFLibConnector¶

class ink.base.connectors.RDFLibConnector(filename, dataformat)¶

Bases: ink.base.connectors.AbstractConnector

A RDFLib connector.

This RDFLib connector class stores the knowledge graph directly within memory.

Parameters

  • filename (str) – The filename of the knowledge graph.

  • dataformat (str) – Dataformat of the knowledge graph. Use XML for OWL files.

Example::

connector = RDFLibConnector(‘example.owl’, ‘xml’)

__init__(filename, dataformat)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

Methods
